hero.title: The AfriNuts Export Cashew Plantation
hero.subtitle: Cultivating West Africa's finest cashews through regenerative agriculture

overview.heading: 50 Hectares of Premium Cashew Production
overview.description: Nestled in Odienné, the epicenter of Ivory Coast's cashew production, our family-owned plantation is being developed using climate-smart agricultural techniques to yield premium grade raw cashew nuts with full traceability from soil to shipment.

items.title: Land Development
items.description: Comprehensive soil mapping, selective land clearing, and installation of precision irrigation infrastructure

items.title: Planting Operations
items.description: Systematic planting of high-yield cashew cultivars across 35 hectares with optimal spacing for growth

items.title: First Commercial Harvest
items.description: Projected initial yield of 8-10 tons per hectare from mature cashew trees

gallery.title: Plantation Progress
gallery.alt1: Developing cashew orchard with young trees

items.title: Water Stewardship
items.description: Drip irrigation systems reducing water usage by 40% compared to traditional methods

items.title: Organic Cultivation
items.description: Integrated pest management and organic fertilizers to maintain ecosystem balance

items.title: Soil Regeneration
items.description: Cover cropping and compost applications to enhance long-term soil fertility
